languages.text: "Как изволите, ваше сиятельство. Смею напомнить, что я все еще под арестом, ваше сиятельство, и едва ли смогу исполнять свои обязанности в подобном положении. Полагаю, в первую очередь вы вынесете свое окончательное суждение о степени моей вины перед вами и мере наказания..."

traits.locale_text: "Как изволите, ваше сиятельство. Смею напомнить, что я все еще под арестом, ваше сиятельство, и едва ли смогу исполнять свои обязанности в подобном положении. Полагаю, в первую очередь вы вынесете свое окончательное суждение о степени моей вины перед вами и мере наказания..."

languages.text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."
languages.original_text: "Как изволите, ваше сиятельство. Смею напомнить, что я все еще под арестом, ваше сиятельство, и едва ли смогу исполнять свои обязанности в подобном положении. Полагаю, в первую очередь вы вынесете свое окончательное суждение о степени моей вины перед вами и мере наказания..."

traits.locale_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfill my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgment on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfill my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgment on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfill my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgment on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

"As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

languages.text: “如您所愿，大人。尽管我不愿提及此事，但我目前处于被逮捕的状态，大人。在这种情况下，我恐怕很难履行我的职责。我建议，首先，也是最重要的一点，我希望您能下达最终判决，让我明白我在多大程度上冒犯了您，以及您要以何种方式惩罚我……”
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

traits.locale_text: “如您所愿，大人。尽管我不愿提及此事，但我目前处于被逮捕的状态，大人。在这种情况下，我恐怕很难履行我的职责。我建议，首先，也是最重要的一点，我希望您能下达最终判决，让我明白我在多大程度上冒犯了您，以及您要以何种方式惩罚我……”

languages.text: «Como ordene mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo, me veo obligada a mencionar que sigo bajo arresto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, lo que me impide desempeñar mis funciones de forma adecuada. En primer lugar, es necesario que emita su veredicto final sobre la magnitud de mis transgresiones y el castigo acorde...».
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

traits.locale_text: «Como ordene mi{mf|lord|lady}. Sin embargo, me veo obligada a mencionar que sigo bajo arresto, mi{mf|lord|lady}, lo que me impide desempeñar mis funciones de forma adecuada. En primer lugar, es necesario que emita su veredicto final sobre la magnitud de mis transgresiones y el castigo acorde...».

languages.text: 「陛下の仰せのままに。このようなことを申し上げるのは気が進みませんが、私はまだ逮捕されておりますます。陛下、こうした状況では私の義務などほとんど果たせません。ご提案なのですが、何よりもまず、私の過ちの重さと処罰について、最終判断をいただきたいのです…」
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下の仰せのままに。このようなことを申し上げるのは気が進みませんが、私はまだ逮捕されておりますます。陛下、こうした状況では私の義務などほとんど果たせません。ご提案なのですが、何よりもまず、私の過ちの重さと処罰について、最終判断をいただきたいのです…」

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich erwähne es ungern, aber ich stehe immer noch unter Arrest, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und werde unter diesen Bedingungen meine Pflichten wohl kaum erfüllen können. Ich schlage vor, dass Ihr zunächst Euer endgültiges Urteil über meine Verfehlung und deren Bestrafung fällt ..."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich erwähne es ungern, aber ich stehe immer noch unter Arrest, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und werde unter diesen Bedingungen meine Pflichten wohl kaum erfüllen können. Ich schlage vor, dass Ihr zunächst Euer endgültiges Urteil über meine Verfehlung und deren Bestrafung fällt ..."

languages.text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. Cependant, je me permets de vous rappeler que je suis en état d'arrestation, et vous comprendrez qu'il m'est impossible de remplir mes fonctions dans ces conditions. Avant toute chose, je vous suggère de rendre votre jugement final quant à la gravité de mes torts et la sanction que vous souhaitez appliquer... »
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

traits.locale_text: « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. Cependant, je me permets de vous rappeler que je suis en état d'arrestation, et vous comprendrez qu'il m'est impossible de remplir mes fonctions dans ces conditions. Avant toute chose, je vous suggère de rendre votre jugement final quant à la gravité de mes torts et la sanction que vous souhaitez appliquer... »

languages.text: "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Söylemekten ikrah ediyorum ama tutukluluğum sürüyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu koşullar altında görevlerimi yerine getirmem pek zor olacak. Dolayısıyla, öncelikle size karşı yaptığım yanlışın raddesi ve cezalandırma şeklim hakkında son kararınızı vermenizi öneririm."
languages.original_text: "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I am loath to mention it, but I am still under arrest, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, and I will hardly be able to fulfil my duties under such conditions. I propose that, first and foremost, you deliver your final judgement on the degree to which I have wronged you and the manner of punishment..."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl isterseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Söylemekten ikrah ediyorum ama tutukluluğum sürüyor {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu koşullar altında görevlerimi yerine getirmem pek zor olacak. Dolayısıyla, öncelikle size karşı yaptığım yanlışın raddesi ve cezalandırma şeklim hakkında son kararınızı vermenizi öneririm."
